pages.text: The $(item)Enchanted Golden Apple$() is a rare, uncraftable variant of the $(item)Golden Apple$() that has stronger effects. $(br2)Can be found in $(item)Chests$(). $(br2)$(n)Effects:$() $(li)$(thing)Absorption IV$() for 2min $(li)$(thing)Regeneration II$() for 30s $(li)$(thing)Fire Resistance$() for 5min $(li)$(thing)Resistance$() for 5min
> Recipe for the regular $(item)Golden Apple$(). $(br)$(br2)$(n)Effects:$() $(li)$(thing)Absorption$() for 2min $(li)$(thing)Regeneration II$() for 5s
